评论概述: Unfortunately didn't keep in the end,
评论详情: The quality of the fabric is amazing, even my daughter with sensory issues loved it. It fit nicely, although we would have needed to switch to a smaller size for her smaller sister if we'd kept it. However the print was extremely disappointing, not only does it not look like the ad post since the shading is none existing. I knew it would be pixilated as shown on the ad image, but seriously none of the detail. Additionally, it is an iron on decal! To make things worse it is a very thick iron on decal, so the fabric under the decal feels like you laid a tarp on a shirt and melted it on to it.

I love the shirt, but it is definitely not loose fitting. It’s actually extremely tight fitting but it’s a really good quality and I love the graphic on it and I still have mine and I ordered this like a year ago.

The print didn't stay on the fabric and the material was super uncomfortable and I didn't like the way the fabric felt on my skin and the fit was super tight around the neck area. It was polyester which is on me from not reading but it was still tight and it just wasn't good.
the quality of the shirt is so bad
Came in looking like an old jpeg. Hard to tell it's misa
super good quality and comfortable!!
This is sadly one of those shirts that’s swimsuit material, get your misa shirt somewhere else :( After washing the fabric still felt gross.
Super cute - quality is like butta it has a very smooth material! Xxl wide but not xxl long ways.. if that makes sense :-)
its that amazin/shein quality but like thats what ur gonna expect when you order clothes off amazon so im ok with it
Not made well

This shirt is not oversized. I got the largest size and it fit like a normal shirt. I am 4'11 and 170lbs. I'm small in the waist and wear medium shirts and this fits like a small. The print of the shirt online is also misleading from what I received. I'm fairly certain if I wash this the design would begin cracking. Not a fan.
This shirt is one of my favorites, great quality and quick delivery! Absolutely love 🌚

I could have ordered a size up, but I didn't because I thought that it would be fine but it came a bit small. So if you don't like when things run small, I'm sorry :( but overall it's a good shirt and love it!
